Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    Admin
    Admin class extenteding person class, represents the admin of the car dealership
    AdminMenu
    Class represents menu for managing cars and users from administrative perspective.
    Car
    This class represents a Car and its atrributes.
    CarDataLoad
    CarDataLoad reads through car_data csv and find and sets Car attributes to variables
    CarFactory
    File to create new car and set car fields from file to variables.
    DataLoad<T>
    The interface for loading and updating data.
    Log
    Logs user actions to file such as time when user logged in, displayed all cars etc.
    Person
    The Person class is the superclass of User and Admin, since both will be sharing a username and a password.
    RegisterCarsPurchased
    RegisterCarsPurchased represents a register of cars that have been sold.
    RunShop
    The RunSop class is where we have our main method, therefore, is where we start to run the dealership.
    User
    The User class extends the Person class and represents the user and all their attributes and functions
    UserAuthentication
    Handles user authentication by verifying credentials, as well as providing access to current user
    UserDataLoad
    The class UserDataLoad is used to create the list of Users from the given .csv file, in addition to updating the list and csv file everytime a user purchases a car
    UserFactory
    File to create new user and store user fields in variables.
    UserMenu
    The class UserMenu display the main menu to the user, as well as it allows the user to navigate through it.
